result.arabic_text: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
result.translation: 56. Woo saakih ayró reedá dubuk Yalli Íe, Usuk moominiin kee koros fan qadlil mekla, tokkel yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari Jannootal ambaxe wayta maqaane Ion.
